caption: The image is a black and white drawing of a person holding a pen and an arrow. The text in the image reads "World Poetry Day" and "Poetry is only proof of life. If your life is well lit, poetry is only the ashes." The drawing is a representation of the importance of poetry in our lives.
original_title: Gray And Hand Black Illustration World Poetry Day Instagram Story
texts:
Poetry is only proof of life. If your life is well lit,
poetry is only the ashes
